whereas the usage of crystalline boron seemed to increase rates.
This perhaps unexpected ﬁnding may relate to the sluggish onset
of reactions with nano-Si/amorphous mixtures at 1150 and 1175
C, during which amorphous boron partially crystallized before
formation was observed (after 40 and 16 h, respectively).
